body_html:
There is always necessarily going to be some interlock involved though, right? You need to always:

  1. Modify pytorch to accept the new image
  2. Deploy it
  3. Modify pytorch to not accept the new image

I am OK with chalking up this test_expect test as a failed experiment and just removing it entirely. There's probably better ways to check that our CI env is consistent.

body:
There is always necessarily going to be some interlock involved though, right? You need to always:

1. Modify pytorch to accept the new image
2. Deploy it
3. Modify pytorch to not accept the new image

I am OK with chalking up this `test_expect` test as a failed experiment and just removing it entirely. There's probably better ways to check that our CI env is consistent.
